issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h2. Feature description
Allow videos to be played inline; an example is the YouTube video embedded in the WebView. There is a property `allowsInlineMediaPlayback` to allow it:

https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/uikit/reference/UIWebView_Class/Reference/Reference.html
fields.summary: iOS: allow playing videos inline in a webview
